name: SysML v2 Part Definition Extraction
description: Extract all part definitions from a SysML v2 model, identifying names, parent types (specializations), and attributes.
prompt:
Extract all `part def` declarations from this SysML v2 model.

Return a JSON array where each object contains:
- "name": the part definition name
- "parent": the parent type if specializing (after :> or 'specializes'), or null
- "attributes": array of attribute names defined in the part

Example output format:
```json
[
  {"name": "Vehicle", "parent": null, "attributes": ["mass", "velocity"]},
  {"name": "FrontAxle", "parent": "Axle", "attributes": ["steeringAngle"]}
]
```

Include ALL part definitions, even empty ones.
